notes: Generated by build_parquet_dataset with validation and statistics.

class_descriptions.Acute Otitis Media: Bacterial or viral infection causing inflammation and fluid buildup behind the eardrum
class_descriptions.Cerumen Impaction: Excessive earwax buildup blocking the ear canal
class_descriptions.Chronic Otitis Media: Persistent ear infection leading to long-term damage
class_descriptions.Myringosclerosis: Formation of calcified plaques on the tympanic membrane
class_descriptions.Normal: Healthy ear with no signs of infection or abnormalities
